artist: Artist: Anthony Vukojevich; Printer: Navigator Press, Pasadena, Calif.; Publisher: Robot Publishing, Pasadena, Calif.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of two figures approaching an undead figure seated upon a pile of skeletons printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 16 pp.
title: The Envelope Licker
